references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper is foundational for score-based generative modeling, which is the basis for many of the models compared against in this paper.
This is a highly influential paper that introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a class of models that the current work builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of progressive distillation for accelerating sampling in diffusion models, a technique relevant to the current work's focus on improving efficiency.

references.paper_title: Flow straight and fast: Learning to generate and transfer data with rectified flow
references.reason: This paper introduced rectified flow, which is directly compared to and improved upon by the proposed method in this paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the superiority of diffusion models over GANs in image synthesis, providing further context for the advancements in this paper.
